Text: Cracking work mate, this is meant to be epic...was only four when it was released,..so ...can't really comment yet, but ...this should be immense..top wk, cheers.
I never knew of this.... should be interesting. Is the theme song as catchy as the Spider Man theme from the 80s? I hope so. Thanks.
I remember this from when I was a kid, 6 years old.. I've always wanted a copy of this for my Kids.. Thank you so much.
